Commands.No Mercy: Group ranged Wind BRV attackExtra damage to debuffed enemies
Commands.Bloodfest: 2-hit group ranged BRV attack + HP attackHP damage sharedLow chance of inflicting MAX BRV Down I for 3 turnsExtra damage to debuffed enemies

Artifacts.Debuff Initiative: Raises Speed by 5% while an enemy is debuffed.
Artifacts.The Eternal Problem Cadet Boost: Increases the effects of The Eternal Problem Cadet by 5%.
Artifacts.Mighty No Mercy: Raises BRV Damage dealt by No Mercy by 10%.
Artifacts.Mighty Bloodfest: Raises BRV Damage dealt by Bloodfest by 10%.

Passives.No Mercy Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with No Mercy.
Passives.Debuff Attack Up: Slightly raises Attack while an enemy is debuffed.
Passives.BRV Guard Up: Slightly raises Defense when BRV is over 50%.
Passives.Bloodfest Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Bloodfest.
Passives.Back Attack: Slightly raises BRV Damage upon attacking an enemy that is not targeting the user.
Passives.No Mercy Charge: Increases the max uses of No Mercy by 1.
Passives.Debuff Boost: Slightly raises Max BRV while an enemy is debuffed.
Passives.Bloodfest Charge: Increases the max uses of Bloodfest by 1.
Passives.The Eternal Problem Cadet: Slightly raises BRV damage when using an AoE

Weapons.Imperial: Increases Bloodfest's potency and raises BRV damage when there is only one target.Increases the potency of Max BRV Down, raises its success rate and extends its duration.Grants Small Max BRV Up for 6 turns.
Weapons.Hyperion: Increases No Mercy's potency and moderately raises BRV damage when there is only one target.Grants a medium probability of inflicting Small Attack Down for 6 turns.
